# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've tried to be authentic, strategic, and fair. I've formed genuine connections while making tough decisions based on game dynamics rather than personal vendettas.

I believe I've played with integrity - being honest about my voting intentions and rationale. When I needed to vote against allies, I did so transparently.

My strategy balanced building relationships with making necessary competitive moves. I've respected everyone's gameplay, even when our paths diverged.

I ask for your vote based on how I've conducted myself - with honesty, respect, and strategic thinking.
